Text: OFOs For Reliant Energy Cc Dannis Per your instruction I have issued an Operational Flow Order to Reliant Energy for gas day of Oct th Germaine Grey and Bob Rossi of Reliant Energy have been contacted via phone fax I have also prepared the OFO form the cover letter that contains the OFO tariff language as well as the fax cover sheet for gas days of October th st in the event there is a need to issue an order If by chance these orders are not issued please let me know Monday October nd so that I can remove the orders from the TSS system I will leave this OFO information on your desk in the event you have questions or changes Please pass along to Gas Control Thanks Marion
